void writeToPacket (  Packet &  packet,
int &  pos,
const CompactSearchHitTypeVector &  container
) 
 

Write all hit types to a packet.

Assumes there is enough room for the container to fit in the packet.

Parameters:
packet Will write data to this packet.
pos The start position to start write, will return the end position.
container All hit types to write into packet.
